name: Purple & pure
description: At Purple and Pure we love the Earth. Zero waste, eco-friendly and mindfulness is the core of our brand. We believe in sustainability and want a safe and clean environment for our future generations. Keeping our approach simple and safe by staying away from plastics, we have a wide range of products from gifting plantable stationary to everyday use essentials like organic bags and bamboo toothbrushes. We are also a brand that supports women empowerment, where women play an important role in bringing the products to you and also benefit from every purchase you make.
